metadata.title: CVE-2015-5245 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
CRLF injection vulnerability in the Ceph Object Gateway (aka radosgw orRGW) in Ceph before 0.94.4 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTTPheaders and conduct HTTP response splitting attacks via a crafted bucketname.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5245` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ceph - 10.2.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
